    Changelog

    AMI Release v20260209

    What's Changed

    • chore: create file system fake by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2610
    • feat(nodeadm): pass nvidia gpu startup labels to kubelet by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2607
    • chore: clean up kubelet config file logic by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2613
    • Add SELinux context restoration by @prasad0896 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2615
    • Log collector collect NMA pod logs by @eddominguez in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2612
    • fix: set the runtime-cgroup flag by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2617

    New Contributors

    • @eddominguez made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2612

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20260128...v20260209

    [ABANDONED] AMI Release v20260128

    [!IMPORTANT] This release was abandoned in favor of the newer v20260129 release. v20260129 has all of this v20260128's changes.

    What's Changed

    • feat: handle users calling nodeadm init directly by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2604

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20260120...v20260128

    AMI Details

    AMI Type Source AMI Name
    AL2023_ARM_64_NVIDIA al2023-ami-minimal-2023.10.20260120.4-kernel-6.12-arm64
    AL2023_ARM_64_STANDARD al2023-ami-minimal-2023.10.20260120.4-kernel-6.1-arm64
    AL2023_x86_64_NEURON al2023-ami-minimal-2023.10.20260120.4-kernel-6.1-x86_64
    AL2023_x86_64_NVIDIA al2023-ami-minimal-2023.10.20260120.4-kernel-6.1-x86_64
    AL2023_x86_64_STANDARD al2023-ami-minimal-2023.10.20260120.4-kernel-6.1-x86_64
    Kubernetes 1.35

    AMI Release v20260120

    What's Changed

    • feat: allow disabling mount of SOCI directory by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2588
    • Add retry to net.LookupHost() in nodeadm by @nkvetsinski in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2585

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20260114...v20260120

    AMI Release v20251217

    What's Changed

    • feat(log-collector): collect mountpoint-s3-csi-driver logs by @dannycjones in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2536
    • feat: mount soci directory to instance store by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2548
    • feat: use console formatted logging for nodeadm by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2552
    • added nftables in AL2023 AMI by @viveksb007 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2547
    • feat(nodeadm): add network name resolution aspect by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2556

    New Contributors

    • @viveksb007 made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2537
    • @Youssef-Beltagy made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2526
    • @dannycjones made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2536
    • @AdnaneKhan made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2478

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20251120...v20251217

    AMI Release v20251120

    What's Changed

    • Remove incorrect assignment of variable by @prasad0896 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2504
    • fix(al2023): fix validate script for nvidia user space driver components by @shvbsle in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2506
    • fix(nodeadm): correct typo in disable pod logs exec by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2508
    • chore(al2023/nvidia): default to 580 driver for 1.29 and 1.30 by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2509
    • fix(al2023): configure proxy before enriching config and e2e test by @shvbsle in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2489
    • chore(build,al2023): remove containerd 1.7 override for 1.30 by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2517

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20251108...v20251120

    AMI Release v20251108

    What's Changed

    • feat(al2023/nvidia): allow nvidia grid install bucket customization by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2501
    • chore(build,al2023): remove containerd 1.7 override for 1.31 by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2502
    • chore(al2023/nvidia): default to 580 driver for 1.32 by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2496
    • refactor(al2023/nvidia): standardize nvidia module installation by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2480
    • chore(al2023/nvidia): default to 580 driver for 1.31 by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2503

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20251103...v20251108

    AMI Release v20251023

    What's Changed

    • fix(al2023): install grid drivers from ec2 grid runfile by @shvbsle in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2450
    • fix(al2023): dynamic proxy function to bypass default caching by http.ProxyFromEnvironment by @shvbsle in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2471
    • feat(nodeadm): add config provider chain and support drop-ins by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2427
    • fix: remove comma delimited configs and cleanup test harness by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2477
    • chore(al2023/nvidia): update to 580 driver for 1.34+ by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2357

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20251016...v20251023

    AMI Release v20251016

    What's Changed

    • feat: allow parallel image pull on more instance types by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2461
    • feat(nodeadm): support public ECR authentication by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2153
    • Pin NVIDIA Driver version for Isolated regions by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2472

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20251007...v20251016

    AMI Release v20251007

    What's Changed

    • feat(nodeadm): add support to configure http-proxy for al2023/nodeadm by @shvbsle in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2384
    • feat(nodeadm): support custom max pods expressions by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2446
    • Add ECR credential provider support for eusc by @rcipdev in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2456

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20251002...v20251007

    AMI Release v20251002

    What's Changed

    • fix(al2023): pass kubeconfig flag for Outpost by @nkvetsinski in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2440
    • fix: restore default ec2 endpoint by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2447
    • feat(nodeadm): standardize systemd networking for all interfaces by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2419
    • fix(al2023): set correct SELinux context for binaries by @HusainZafar in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2406
    • feat(al2023): Use restorecon to configure security context for binaries by @shvbsle in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2451
    • fix: use gp2 suffix to match source AMI for AL2 by @junpengdev in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2453

    New Contributors

    • @junpengdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2453

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250920...v20251002

    AMI Release v20250920

    What's Changed

    • feat(build): add packer custom EC2 endpoint support by @rcipdev in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2433
    • feat(al2023): enable graceful shutdown in 1.34+ by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2390

    New Contributors

    • @rcipdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2433

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250915...v20250920

    AMI Release v20250904

    What's Changed

    • Add log collection for gmsa on Windows by @KlwntSingh in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2399
    • Add us-isob-west-1 build prod acct by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2408
    • fix(nodeadm): improve error handling for install-nodeadm.sh by @guessi in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2405
    • fix(nodeadm): resolve config race with systemd-networkd by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2397

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250829...v20250904

    AMI Release v20250829

    [!WARNING] Amazon Linux 2 GPU AMIs on Kubernetes version 1.32 have started installing NVIDIA drivers via the runfile method. Dependencies on previously existing packages/libraries may cause issues.

    What's Changed

    • Enable MutableCSINodeAllocatableCount in v1.34.0+ by @torredil in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2389
    • Add soci snapshotter info to eks-log-collector by @HusainZafar in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2393
    • chore(al2): add ecr account for us-isof-east-1 by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2402

    New Contributors

    • @torredil made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2389

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250821...v20250829

    AMI Release v20250821

    What's Changed

    • chore(nodeadm): rename feature flag by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2381
    • feat: load ip_tables and iptable_nat for AMIs with kernel 6.12 by @shvbsle in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2355
    • chore: cleanup unneeded logic for EOL versions by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2382
    • feat(nodeadm): enable verbose SDK logging in development mode by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2383

    New Contributors

    • @shvbsle made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2355

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250819...v20250821

    AMI Release v20250819

    What's Changed

    • fix: install containerd from rpm and versionlock it by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2368
    • fix(al2023/nvidia): rename nvidia driver based on version by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2370
    • chore: drop shellcheck level to warning by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2371

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250813...v20250819

    AMI Release v20250807

    What's Changed

    • fix(nvidia): downgrade to 570 driver by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2346
    • feat: option to install containerd 1.7 from S3 by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2339
    • feat(nodeadm): add containerd 2.x support by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2252
    • chore: cleanup unneeded logic for EOL versions by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2353
    • fix: pin kernel to good version by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2356

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250806...v20250807

    AMI Release v20250704

    What's Changed

    • build(al2): unpin runc from .1 minor version by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2315

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250627...v20250704

    AMI Details

    AMI Type Source AMI Name

    AMI Release v20250627

    What's Changed

    • feat(log-collector): collect systemd-network configs and unattended-upgrades by @Issacwww in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2304
    • add containerd versionlock for al2023 by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2309

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250620...v20250627

    AMI Release v20250620

    What's Changed

    • feat(nodeadm): enable DRA for 1.33+ by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2285
    • feat(nodeadm): expose more local storage options by @fletcherw in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2295
    • fix(nodeadm): write user kubelet config with priority 40 on 1.29+ by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2297

    New Contributors

    • @kummatty made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2277
    • @fletcherw made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2295

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250610...v20250620

    AMI Release v20250519

    What's Changed

    • fix: make ctr usage compatible with containerd-2.x by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2250
    • chore: bump undici from 5.28.5 to 5.29.0 in /.github/actions/bot by @dependabot in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2254
    • fix(log-collector,io-throttling): only exclude procs with 0 cs of delay by @scole66 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2256

    New Contributors

    • @scole66 made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2256

    What's Changed

    • chore(al2): update ECR registries for latest regions by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2243
    • feat(al2023/nvidia): install nvlsm by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2239

    AMI Release v20250501

    What's Changed

    • feat(build): add version info for all kernel modules by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2225
    • build(al2023,neuron): add dkms module check and pin kernel packages by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2231
    • Add deprecation note by @tucktuck9 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2237
    • Upgrade to Containerd2.0 for 1.33+ by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2235
    • feat(nodeadm): configure container runtime based on binaries by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2227

    New Contributors

    • @tucktuck9 made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2237

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250419...v20250501

    AMI Release v20250410

    What's Changed

    • build(al2023): bump nvidia 570 driver by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2207
    • build(al2023): install nvidia container toolkit from cuda repo by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2208

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250403...v20250410

    AMI Release v20250403

    What's Changed

    • bug(log-collector): fix ipvs script errors by @guessi in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2194
    • feat(test): build nodeadm on host by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2195
    • fix(al2023): support 570 nvidia driver and pin kernel minor version to 6.1 by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2200
    • build(al2023,china): install nvidia container toolkit from cuda repo by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2202

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250317...v20250403

    AMI Release v20250317

    What's Changed

    • Add ENA driver version in version info file by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2171
    • docs(log-collector): add warning banner post-execution for log collector by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2174
    • feat(nodeadm): enable CDI for 1.32+ by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2173
    • chore: bump golang.org/x/net from 0.33.0 to 0.36.0 in /nodeadm by @dependabot in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2183
    • chore: remove deprecated flag from CI by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2186
    • feat(ci): allow additional kubetest2 deployer args by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2187

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250304...v20250317

    AMI Release v20250228

    What's Changed

    • Add support for raid10 by @lassizci in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1900

    New Contributors

    • @lassizci made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1900

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250224...v20250228

    AMI Release v20250224

    What's Changed

    • build: attempt setting tsc as clock source by @mselim00 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2144
    • build(nvidia): install nvidia-imex driver by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2136
    • feat(al2): use ecr-credential-provider for public.ecr.aws in 1.27+ by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1949
    • build(nvidia): support arm64 builds by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2137
    • chore: bump @octokit/plugin-paginate-rest and @actions/github in /.github/actions/bot by @dependabot in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2158

    New Contributors

    • @mselim00 made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2144

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250212...v20250224

    AMI Release v20250203

    What's Changed

    • chore: bump golang.org/x/net from 0.26.0 to 0.33.0 in /nodeadm by @dependabot in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2130
    • chore(al2023): remove EFA workaround for aws-iso-f by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2131

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250123...v20250203

    AMI Type Source AMI Name

    AMI Release v20250123

    [!NOTE] The CUDA toolkit will be removed from AL2 GPU variants. This release includes this change for Kubernetes 1.28 and later. The CUDA toolkit is a development tool and should be included in the container image if necessary.

    What's Changed

    • docs(nodeadm): clarify config-source by @Issacwww in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2108

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250116...v20250123

    AMI Details

    AMI Type Source AMI Name
    AL2023_ARM_64_STANDARD al2023-ami-minimal-2023.6.20250115.0-kernel-6.1-arm64
    AL2023_x86_64_NEURON al2023-ami-minimal-2023.6.20250115.0-kernel-6.1-x86_64
    AL2023_x86_64_NVIDIA al2023-ami-minimal-2023.6.20250115.0-kernel-6.1-x86_64
    AL2023_x86_64_STANDARD al2023-ami-minimal-2023.6.20250115.0-kernel-6.1-x86_64
    AL2_ARM_64 amzn2-ami-minimal-hvm-2.0.20250116.0-arm64-ebs
    AL2_x86_64 amzn2-ami-minimal-hvm-2.0.20250116.0-x86_64-ebs
    AL2_x86_64_GPU amzn2-ami-minimal-hvm-2.0.20250116.0-x86_64-ebs

    AMI Release v20250116

    What's Changed

    • Add flag to indicate script is running on EKS Hybrid nodes by @abhay-krishna in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2097
    • fix(nodeadm): increase IMDS retries by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2112
    • fix: install paths for test tools by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2114
    • feat(al2): align dummy kernel mod options with newer systemd default by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2115

    New Contributors

    • @abhay-krishna made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2097

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20250103...v20250116

    nvidia-container-toolkit 1.17.3-1 —
    runc 1.1.14-1.amzn2023.0.1

    AMI Release v20250103

    [!NOTE] The CUDA toolkit will be removed from AL2 GPU variants. This release includes this change for Kubernetes 1.30 and later. The CUDA toolkit is a development tool and should be included in the container image if necessary.

    What's Changed

    • Bump pause image to 3.10 by @dims in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2099
    • fix: setup-local-disks for mode “none” by @vflaux in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2105

    New Contributors

    • @vflaux made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2105

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20241225...v20250103

    AMI Details

    AMI Type Source AMI Name
    AL2023_ARM_64_STANDARD al2023-ami-minimal-2023.6.20241212.0-kernel-6.1-arm64
    AL2023_x86_64_NEURON al2023-ami-minimal-2023.6.20241212.0-kernel-6.1-x86_64
    AL2023_x86_64_NVIDIA al2023-ami-minimal-2023.6.20241212.0-kernel-6.1-x86_64
    AL2023_x86_64_STANDARD al2023-ami-minimal-2023.6.20241212.0-kernel-6.1-x86_64
    AL2_ARM_64 amzn2-ami-minimal-hvm-2.0.20241217.0-arm64-ebs
    AL2_x86_64 amzn2-ami-minimal-hvm-2.0.20241217.0-x86_64-ebs
    AL2_x86_64_GPU amzn2-ami-minimal-hvm-2.0.20241217.0-x86_64-ebs

    efa 2.13.0-1.amzn2023 —
    kernel 6.1.119-129.201.amzn2023
    kmod-nvidia-latest-dkms 560.35.05-1.amzn2023 —
    nvidia-container-toolkit 1.17.3-1 —
    runc 1.1.14-1.amzn2023.0.1

    AMI Release v20241225

    Note: starting this release, CUDA tookit will be removed from AL2 GPU variants for 1.31 and above versions. To align with our other variants (AL23 and Bottlerocket), Xref, and the lower version will be backported in future releases

    What's Changed

    • fix(imds): handle control characters in response by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2093
    • feat: add new ECR endpoints to EKS ECR credential provider config by @BDworak in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2082
    • better handle non eks optimized amis by @jaxesn in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2073
    • fix(al2): add retries to cluster-active waiter by @msarfaty in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2096

    New Contributors

    • @BDworak made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2082
    • @jaxesn made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2073
    • @msarfaty made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2096

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20241213...v20241225

    AMI Release v20241213

    What's Changed

    • Optimize installing NVIDIA Repo in isolated partitions by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2085
    • AL2023 Isolated build fix removing nvidia open drivers, install nvidia ctk from repo by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2086
    • AL2023 Isolated build temp workaround for EFA installer by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2087
    • feat(docs): add nodeadm wasm targets to call from docs by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2083
    • Isolated AL2023 build - Install Nvidia driver by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2090

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20241205...v20241213

    AMI Release v20241205

    What's Changed

    • Isolated partition install nvidia-persistenced by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2081

    New Contributors

    • @woernfl made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2078

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20241121...v20241205

    AMI Release v20241121

    What's Changed

    • feat(al2023): warn about bootstrap.sh usage by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2056
    • build: pull s3 binaries as root by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2058
    • Bump up nvidia-contianer-toolkit version by @Issacwww in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2064

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20241115...v20241121

    nvidia-container-toolkit 1.17.2-1 —
    runc 1.1.14-1.amzn2023.0.1

    AMI Release v20241115

    Note: The GPU AMIs in this release are utilizing a version of the NVIDIA Container Toolkit (version 1.17.1) that contains a known defect. This issue is documented in the NVIDIA GitHub repository (https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-container-toolkit/issues/797).

    We are currently in the process of preparing an updated AMI that will incorporate the corrected version of the NVIDIA Container Toolkit (version 1.17.2). The next release will address this issue.

    What's Changed

    • feat(gpu): add shared nvidia boost clock logic by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2014
    • feat(al2023): cache and retag pause container by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2000
    • Add new regions for ecr images by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2055
    • chore(nodeadm): add p5en to NVIDIA nstance type families by @mattcjo in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2050

    New Contributors

    • @mebays made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2053
    • @mattcjo made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2050

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20241109...v20241115

    AMI Release v20241109

    What's Changed

    • Address installation of NVIDIA drivers for Isolated partitions by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2038

    AMI Release v20241106

    What's Changed

    • feat(al2023): support NVIDIA variant in isolated partitions by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2022
    • feat(al2023): Bug fix - Fix repo for Nvidia AL2023 repo, install Nvidia CTK for isolated partitions by @whoix in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2033

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20241024...v20241106

    kernel 5.10.227-219.884.amzn2
    kmod-nvidia-latest-dkms — 550.127.05-1.el7
    nvidia-driver-latest-dkms — 550.127.05-1.el7
    runc 1.1.14-1.amzn2
    Package AL2023_x86_64_NVIDIA AL2023_x86_64_NEURON AL2023_x86_64_STANDARD AL2023_ARM_64_STANDARD
    amazon-ssm-agent 3.3.859.0-1.amzn2023
    aws-neuronx-dkms — 2.18.12.0-dkms —
    containerd 1.7.22-1.amzn2023.0.2
    efa 2.12.1-1.amzn2023 —
    kernel 6.1.112-122.189.amzn2023
    kmod-nvidia-latest-dkms 560.35.03-1.amzn2023 —
    runc 1.1.14-1.amzn2023.0.1

    AMI Release v20241024

    Note

    The Amazon Linux 2-based AMIs have been updated to include NVIDIA driver version 550.127.05, addressing several vulnerabilities in the GPU display driver.

    The Amazon Linux 2023-based AMIs are not affected, as they utilize NVIDIA driver version R560.

    For more information, please refer to the NVIDIA security bulletin: https://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/5586

    What's Changed

    • feat(log-collector-script): include systemd-analyze SVG by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2012
    • EKS logs collector script kube-proxy IPVS information scrape by @AbeOwlu in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1795
    • feat(al2023): initialize critical binaries from EBS filesystem by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2011
    • feat(ci): add canary by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2015
    • Add optional ECR auth to nodeadm by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2017
    • fix: use nerdctl to get auth creds by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2018

    New Contributors

    • @AbeOwlu made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1795

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20241016...v20241024

    AMI Release v20241016

    What's Changed

    • templates(al23): unpin containerd by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2008
    • nodeadm(bug): scope merge transformer with internal types by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/2003
    • feat(nodeadm): use cached kubelet version to reduce config time by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1991

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20241011...v20241016

    AMI Release v20241011

    What's Changed

    • chore(nodeadm): address gosec detections by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1993
    • nodeadm(feat): add mime multi-part support to file config provider by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1992
    • nodeadm: retry IMDS 404 errors by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1970
    • templates(al2): update containerd to latest by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1998

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240928...v20241011

    runc 1.1.13-1.amzn2023.0.1

    AMI Release v20240928

    Note This release includes a security patch for the vulnerabilities CVE-2024-0132 and CVE-2024-0133 in the nvidia-container-toolkit package. The patch has been applied to the Amazon EKS Accelerated Amazon Machine Image (AMI) for both Amazon Linux 2 and Amazon Linux 2023 versions.

    What's Changed

    • Fix cn build by @Issacwww in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1980

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240924...v20240928

    AMI Details

    AMI Release v20240924

    What's Changed

    • nodeadm: block until daemon status changes are reflected by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1965
    • templates(al23): pass build image for nodeadm by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1971
    • fix: Add p5e to list of NVIDIA instances for setting the correct container runtime config by @bryantbiggs in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1974
    • Fix AL2023 Support for iam_instance_profile by @pjaudiomv in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1975

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240910...v20240924

    AMI Release v20240910

    What's Changed

    • Add additional ecr provider patterns by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1954
    • Add new region ecr accounts and domains by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1956
    • Wait for networking to be up before loading NVIDIA kernel modules by @nkvetsinski in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1962

    New Contributors

    • @brc made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1955

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240904...v20240910

    AMI Release v20240904

    [!NOTE] This release updates the NVIDIA driver to the 550 release branch. There is no change in supported instance types.

    What's Changed

    • Add build scripts for building Nvidia and Neuron AMIs based on AL2023 by @nkvetsinski in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1924

    New Contributors

    • @nkvetsinski made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1924
    • @ryoyanoamazon made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1941

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240828...v20240904

    AMI Release v20240828

    What's Changed

    • eks-log-collector.sh: add reboot history by @gomesdigital in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1920
    • Fix max-pods-calculator to consider only network card 0 by @Pavani-Panakanti in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1930
    • templates: downgrade to containerd 1.7.11 by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1937

    New Contributors

    • @gomesdigital made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1920
    • @Pavani-Panakanti made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1930

    • feat(ci): emit kubetest2 metrics by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1914

    AMI Release v20240729

    What's Changed

    • bug(nodeadm): Don't wrap kubelet systemd environment variable by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1880
    • chore(nodeadm): remove aws sdk v1 refs by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1887
    • bug(template): fetch the correct kubernetes build date for linux binaries by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1889
    • add retry to avoid ECR get auth token failed for some transient issues by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1886
    • Fall back to non fips endpoint per availability by @Issacwww in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1897
    • Add ECR image sources for ap-southeast-5 by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1898

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240703...v20240729

    AMI Release v20240625

    What's Changed

    • Add ListBucket action in IAM permissions. by @YngveMolnes in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1844
    • Include /etc/fstab in log collection by @JoeNorth in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1836
    • bug(al2023): Do not bind containerd restarts to kubelet by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1854
    • bug(bot): fix handling of listFiles response by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1856
    • Make bootstrap GPU helper container runtime aware by @suket22 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1858

    New Contributors

    • @YngveMolnes made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1844

    AMI Release v20240615

    What's Changed

    • move gpu boost clock to gpu boostrap helper by @wwvela in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1827
    • Remove sudo from bootstrap commands by @zhuoweilee in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1773
    • This fixes an issue when SELinux is enabled that causes significant delays during bootstrap.
    • If you use a non-root user to execute the bootstrap script in your user data (this is not common), you'll need to update your user data accordingly (e.g. sudo bootstrap.sh ...).
    • al2023: Use base_runtime_spec to set default rlimits by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1794
    • Clarify InstanceIdNodeName docs by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1831

    New Contributors

    • @zhuoweilee made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1773

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240531...v20240615

    runc 1.1.11-1.amzn2

    AMI Release v20240522

    [!NOTE] Be aware that we are tracking an ongoing issue with the 535-series drivers and instance types in the g4 and g5 families. This release disabled GSP on 1.22+ on g4 and g5 families to mitigate this issue. More information is available in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/issues/1523.

    What's Changed

    • log any processes with large environments by @tzneal in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1807
    • Collect Network Policy ebpf data from log collector script by @jaydeokar in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1805

    New Contributors

    • @guikcd made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1813

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240514...v20240522

    containerd 1.7.11-1.amzn2.0.1
    cuda — 12.2.2-1
    cuda-12-2 — 12.2.2-1
    docker 25.0.3-1.amzn2.0.1
    kernel 5.10.216-204.855.amzn2 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2
    nvidia-driver-latest-dkms — 535.161.07-1.el7
    runc 1.1.11-1.amzn2

    Note A recent change in the Linux kernel caused the EFA and NVIDIA drivers to be incompatible. More information is available in #1494. To prevent unexpected failures, the kernel in the GPU AMI will remain at the following versions until we have determined a solution: - Kubernetes 1.21 and below: 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2

    AMI Release v20240514

    [!NOTE] Be aware that we are tracking an ongoing issue with the 535-series drivers and instance types in the g4 and g5 families. This release disabled GSP on 1.23+ on g4 and g5 families to mitigate this issue. More information is available in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/issues/1523.

    What's Changed

    • rework containerd config merging by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1780
    • Handle existing nerdctl installations by @ricomasgu in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1786

    New Contributors

    • @ricomasgu made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1786

    cuda — 12.2.2-1
    cuda-12-2 — 12.2.2-1
    docker 25.0.3-1.amzn2.0.1
    kernel 5.10.215-203.850.amzn2 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2
    nvidia-driver-latest-dkms — 535.161.07-1.el7
    runc 1.1.11-1.amzn2

    Note A recent change in the Linux kernel caused the EFA and NVIDIA drivers to be incompatible. More information is available in #1494. To prevent unexpected failures, the kernel in the GPU AMI will remain at the following versions until we have determined a solution: - Kubernetes 1.22 and below: 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2

    AMI Release v20240506

    [!NOTE]

    Be aware that we are tracking an ongoing issue with the 535-series drivers and instance types in the g4 and g5 families. This release disabled GSP on 1.24+ on g4 and g5 families to mitigate this issue. More information is available in #1523.

    What's Changed

    • al2023: Remove duplicate logrotate entries by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1777
    • Add cron logs to Log Collector Script by @tzneal in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1781

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240424...v20240506

    AMI Release v20240424

    [!NOTE]

    Be aware that we are tracking an ongoing issue with the 535-series drivers and instance types in the g4 and g5 families. This release disabled GSP on 1.25+ on g4 and g5 families to mitigate this issue. More information is available in #1523.

    • Add InstanceIdNodeName feature gate by @Issacwww in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1731
    • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.19.0 to 0.23.0 in /nodeadm by @dependabot in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1769

    • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1769

    docker 25.0.3-1.amzn2.0.1
    kernel 5.10.214-202.855.amzn2 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2
    nvidia-driver-latest-dkms — 535.161.07-1.el7
    runc 1.1.11-1.amzn2

    cuda-12-2 — 12.2.2-1
    docker 25.0.3-1.amzn2.0.1
    kernel 5.10.214-202.855.amzn2 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2
    nvidia-driver-latest-dkms — 535.161.07-1.el7
    runc 1.1.11-1.amzn2

    Note A recent change in the Linux kernel caused the EFA and NVIDIA drivers to be incompatible. More information is available in #1494. To prevent unexpected failures, the kernel in the GPU AMI will remain at the following versions until we have determined a solution: - Kubernetes 1.24 and below: 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2

    AMI Release v20240415

    [!NOTE]

    Be aware that we are tracking an ongoing issue with the 535-series drivers and instance types in the g4 and g5 families. This release disabled GSP on 1.26+ on g4 and g5 families. More information is available in #1523.

    What's Changed

    • Use GitHub token when fetching Packer plugins by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1757
    • Wait for network-online to configure clocksource by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1758

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240409...v20240415

    AMI Release v20240409

    What's Changed

    • Retry IMDS calls on ECONNREFUSED by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1749
    • Add bootstrap helper for GPU AMI by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1754

    New Contributors

    • @dunefro made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1752

    cuda-12-2 — 12.2.2-1

    kernel 5.10.213-201.855.amzn2 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2
    nvidia-driver-latest-dkms — 535.161.07-1.el7
    runc 1.1.11-1.amzn2

    Note A recent change in the Linux kernel caused the EFA and NVIDIA drivers to be incompatible. More information is available in #1494. To prevent unexpected failures, the kernel in the GPU AMI will remain at the following versions until we have determined a solution: - Kubernetes 1.26 and below: 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2

    AMI Release v20240329

    [!NOTE]

    Be aware that we are tracking an ongoing issue with the 535-series drivers and instance types in the g4 and g5 families. This release disabled GSP on 1.27+ on g4 and g5 families. More information is available in #1523.

    What's Changed

    • support os_distro and version for CI job by @Issacwww in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1726
    • Add support for disabling Bind Mounting of kubelet, containerd and var-log-pods to setup-local-disk by @primeroz in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1723
    • bump kernel in AL2 to 5.10 for rest of k8s versions by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1728
    • fix context timeout associated with imds apis by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1732
    • Add support to collect Windows Events relevant to Windows Containers by @KlwntSingh in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1739
    • make 80-ec2.network match primary eni only by @M00nF1sh in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1738

    New Contributors

    • @primeroz made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1723

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240315...v20240329

    Note A recent change in the Linux kernel caused the EFA and NVIDIA drivers to be incompatible. More information is available in #1494. To prevent unexpected failures, the kernel in the GPU AMI will remain at the following versions until we have determined a solution: - Kubernetes 1.26 and below: 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2

    AMI Release v20240315

    [!NOTE] This release upgrade docker from 20.10.* to 25.0.3 in 1.24 and below Non-GPU AMI and 1.28 and below GPU-AMIs This update also resolves a security issue. More information is available in #1733

    Be aware that we are tracking an ongoing issue with the 535-series drivers and instance types in the g4 and g5 families. This release disabled GSP on 1.28 and 1.29 GPU AMI for g4 instance type. More information is available in #1523.

    Be aware that there is an intermittent race condition issue happend in 1.28 and 1.29 GPU AMI. More information is available in #1697

    What's Changed

    • Build AL2 AMI for 1.21 and 1.22 by @Issacwww in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1722
    • Use PrivateDnsName as Node name in nodeadm by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1715

    New Contributors

    • @PT-GD made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1712

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240307...v20240315

    containerd 1.7.11-1.amzn2.0.1
    cuda — 12.2.2-1
    cuda-12-2 — 12.2.2-1
    docker 25.0.3-1.amzn2.0.1
    kernel 5.4.269-183.369.amzn2 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2
    nvidia-driver-latest-dkms — 535.161.07-1.el7
    runc 1.1.11-1.amzn2

    Note A recent change in the Linux kernel caused the EFA and NVIDIA drivers to be incompatible. More information is available in #1494. To prevent unexpected failures, the kernel in the GPU AMI will remain at the following versions until we have determined a solution: - Kubernetes 1.27 and below: 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2

    AMI Release v20240307

    [!NOTE] This release completes our backporting of the 535-series NVIDIA drivers to all supported Kubernetes versions. This driver update also resolves a security issue. Be aware that we are tracking an ongoing issue with the 535-series drivers and instance types in the g4 and g5 families. More information is available in #1523.

    What's Changed

    • Migrate CI to kubetest2, add AL2023 by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1689
    • Collect IPv6 Networking Information in Log Collector Script by @jdn5126 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1702
    • increase nodeadm network resilience by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1699
    • Support multiple, comma-separated --dns-cluster-ip values by @ajohnstone in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1685
    • Add ability to specify a user data file by @AlexSchultz-clumio in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1687
    • Add iam instance profile support by @AlexSchultz-clumio in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1679
    • Clarify k8s version make targets by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1709
    • log-collector: refactor get_k8s_info by @wafuwafu13 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1652

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240227...v20240307

    AMI Release v20240227

    [!NOTE] This release includes changes in the Kubernetes 1.29 GPU AMI to address a compatibility issue with the EFA and NVIDIA kernel modules. More information is available in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/issues/1494.

    What's Changed

    • Allow containerd config imports by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1630
    • cleanup al2023 templates by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1682
    • Do not prepare local disks by default by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1686
    • Add InstanceOptions with LocalDiskStrategy by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1688
    • Remove setup-local-disks unit from al2023 template by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1691

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240213...v20240227

    runc 1.1.11-1.amzn2023.0.1

    Note A recent change in the Linux kernel caused the EFA and NVIDIA drivers to be incompatible. More information is available in #1494. To prevent unexpected failures, the kernel in the GPU AMI will remain at the following versions until we have determined a solution: - Kubernetes 1.24 and below: 5.4.254-170.358.amzn2 - Kubernetes 1.25-1.28: 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2

    AMI Release v20240213

    What's Changed

    • harden pull-sandbox-image script by @ndbaker1 in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1649
    • Merge al2023 to main by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1653
    • Switch branch for dependency review by @Issacwww in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1659

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240209...v20240213

    [!NOTE] The notes on the Releases page may be truncated, and you may not see all supported Kubernetes versions. The full release notes can be viewed here. More information is in #1666.

    AMI Release v20240202

    [!NOTE] This release addresses an issue with Kubernetes 1.29 that allowed the sandbox container image used by containerd to be garbage-collected by kubelet. More information is available in #1597.

    If you install the AWS CLI v1 on your nodes (such as with yum install aws-cli), the sandbox container image may not be pulled correctly. We recommend you use the AWS CLI v2 which is included in the AMI.

    What's Changed

    • Use crictl to pull sandbox image by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1605
    • Remove sandbox image from build-time cache by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1615

    Full Changelog: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/compare/v20240129...v20240202

    docker 20.10.25-1.amzn2.0.4
    kernel 5.4.266-178.365.amzn2
    nvidia-driver-latest-dkms 470.182.03-1.el7
    runc 1.1.11-1.amzn2

    Note A recent change in the Linux kernel caused the EFA and NVIDIA drivers to be incompatible. More information is available in #1494. To prevent unexpected failures, the kernel in the GPU AMI will remain at the following versions until we have determined a solution: - Kubernetes 1.24 and below: 5.4.254-170.358.amzn2 - Kubernetes 1.25 and above: 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2

    AMI Release v20231220

    What's Changed

    • Set containerd LimitNOFILE to recommended value by @cartermckinnon in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1535
    • Update get-ecr-uri.sh with ca-west-1 account by @mmerkes in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1542
    • Fix typo opt names in bootstrap.sh logging by @ketozhang in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1547

    • @ketozhang made their first contribution in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/pull/1547

    Note A recent change in the Linux kernel caused the EFA and NVIDIA drivers to be incompatible. More information is available in #1494. To prevent unexpected failures, the kernel in the GPU AMI will remain at the following versions until we have determined a solution: - Kubernetes 1.24 and below: 5.4.254-170.358.amzn2 - Kubernetes 1.25 and above: 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2

    Release versions for these AMIs: * 1.28.2-20231027 * 1.27.6-20231027 * 1.26.9-20231027 * 1.25.14-20231027 * 1.24.17-20231027 * 1.23.17-20231027

    Binaries used to build these AMIs are published: * s3://amazon-eks/1.28.2/2023-10-17/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.27.6/2023-10-17/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.26.9/2023-10-17/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.25.14/2023-10-17/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.24.17/2023-10-17/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.23.17/2023-10-17/

    AMI details: * kernel: * Kubernetes 1.23 and below: 5.4.257-170.359.amzn2 * Kubernetes 1.24 and above: 5.10.197-186.748.amzn2 * ⚠️ Note: A recent change in the Linux kernel caused the EFA and NVIDIA drivers to be incompatible. More information is available in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/issues/1494. To prevent unexpected failures, the kernel in the GPU AMI will remain at the following versions until we have determined a solution: * Kubernetes 1.27 and below: 5.4.254-170.358.amzn2 * Kubernetes 1.28 and above: 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2 * dockerd: 20.10.23-1.amzn2.0.1 * Note that Docker is not installed on AMI's with Kubernetes 1.25+. * containerd: 1.6.19-1.amzn2.0.5 * runc: 1.1.7-4.amzn2 * cuda: 12.2.0-1 * nvidia-container-runtime-hook: 1.4.0-1.amzn2 * amazon-ssm-agent: 3.2.1705.0-1

    Notable changes: - Add optional FIPS support (#1458) - Fix region in cached image names (#1461) - Update curl for ALAS-2023-2287 - Update kernel for ALASKERNEL-5.10-2023-039

    Minor changes: - Add r7i to eni-max-pods.txt (#1473) - Correctly tag cached images for us-gov-west-1 FIPS endpoint (#1476) - Add new i4i sizes to eni-max-pods.txt (#1495)

    AMI details: * kernel: * Kubernetes 1.23 and below: 5.4.254-170.358.amzn2 * Kubernetes 1.24 and above: 5.10.192-183.736.amzn2 * Note that the GPU AMI on Kubernetes 1.27 and below will continue to use kernel-5.4 as we work to address a compatibility issue with nvidia-driver-latest-dkms. * dockerd: 20.10.23-1.amzn2.0.1 * Note that Docker is not installed on AMI's with Kubernetes 1.25+. * containerd: 1.6.19-1.amzn2.0.3 * runc: 1.1.7-3.amzn2 * cuda: 12.2.0-1 * nvidia-container-runtime-hook: 1.4.0-1.amzn2 * amazon-ssm-agent: 3.2.1630.0-1

    Notable changes: - SSM agent upgraded to 3.2.1630.0-1 - Update libssh2 for ALAS-2023-2257

    Release versions for these AMIs: * 1.26.2-20230501 * 1.25.7-20230501 * 1.24.11-20230501 * 1.23.17-20230501 * 1.22.17-20230501

    Binaries used to build these AMIs are published: * s3://amazon-eks/1.26.2/2023-03-17/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.25.7/2023-03-17/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.24.11/2023-03-17/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.23.17/2023-03-17/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.22.17/2023-03-17/

    AMI details: * kernel: * Kubernetes 1.23 and below: 5.4.241-150.347.amzn2 * Kubernetes 1.24 and above: 5.10.178-162.673.amzn2 * dockerd: 20.10.17-1.amzn2.0.1 * Note that Docker is not installed on AMI's with Kubernetes 1.25+. * containerd: 1.6.19-1.amzn2.0.1 * runc: 1.1.4-1.amzn2 * cuda: 11.4.0-1 * nvidia-container-runtime-hook: 1.4.0-1.amzn2 * amazon-ssm-agent: 3.1.1732.0-1.amzn2

    Notable changes: - Add bootstrap option to create a local NVMe raid0 or individual volume mounts (#1171) - Improve bootstrap logging (#1276) - Use credential provider API v1 in 1.27+, v1alpha1 in 1.26- (#1269) - Override hostname to match EC2's PrivateDnsName (#1264) - Add ethtool (#1261) - Update kernel-5.10 for ALASKERNEL-5.10-2023-031 - Kernel version upgrade to 5.10.178-162.673.amzn2 fixes the Containers failing to create and probe exec errors related to seccomp on recent kernel-5.10 versions issue

    Notable changes: - The AMI changes include update for 5.4 kernel version from 5.4.238-148.346.amzn2 to kernel-5.4.238-148.347.amzn2. kernel-5.4.238-148.346 had a fatal issue affecting SMB mounts in which a null pointer dereference caused a panic. As a result, this package was removed from the Amazon Linux 2 repositories.

    Minor changes: - Updated eni-max-pods.txt with new instance types. - Allow kernel_version to be set to any value (such as 5.15) when building a custom AMI.

This feature was only enabled for 1.24 AMI's in the previous release, v20221222.

    Notable changes: - Kernel updated to 5.4.226-129.415.amzn2 for: - ALASKERNEL-5.4-2022-040 - ALASKERNEL-5.4-2022-039 - NVIDIA driver updated to 470.161.03-1 to address security issues. More information is available in NVIDIA security bulletin #5415. - Cache pause, vpc-cni, and kube-proxy images during build (#938) - Note that this has only been enabled for 1.24 AMIs at this time. - Disable yum updates in cloud-init (#1074) - Skip sandbox image pull if already present (#1090) - Move variable defaults to --var-file (#1079)

    Minor changes: - Add ECR accounts for eu-south-2, eu-central-2, ap-south-2 (#1125) - Handle indentation when parsing sandbox_image from containerd config (#1119) - Lookup instanceId using IMDSv2 in Windows log collector script (#1116) - Remove aws_region and binary_bucket_region overrides from Makefile (#1115) - Sym-link awscli to /bin (#1102) - Configure containerd registry certificates by default (#1049)

    Release versions for these AMIs: * 1.23.9-20221101 * 1.22.12-20221101 * 1.21.14-20221101 * 1.20.15-20221101

    Binaries used to build these AMIs are published: * s3://amazon-eks/1.23.9/2022-07-27/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.22.12/2022-07-27/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.21.14/2022-07-27/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.20.15/2022-07-27/

    AMI details: * kernel: 5.4.209-116.367.amzn2 * dockerd: 20.10.17-1.amzn2.0.1 * containerd: 1.6.6-1.amzn2.0.2 * runc: 1.1.3-1.amzn2.0.2 * cuda: 470.141.03-1 * nvidia-container-runtime-hook: 1.4.0-1.amzn2 * SSM agent: 3.1.1732.0-1.amzn2

    Notable changes: * Pin Kernel 5.4 to 5.4.209-116.367 to prevent nodes from going into Unready #1072 * Increase the kube-api-server QPS from 5/10 to 10/20 #1030 * Update docker and containerd for ALASDOCKER-2022-021 #1056 * runc version is updated to 1.1.3-1.amzn2.0.2 to include ALAS2DOCKER-2022-020 #1055 * Release AMI in me-central-1 with version 1.21, 1.22, 1.23. 1.20 is not supported in this region since it will be deprecated soon. * Fixes an issue with Docker daemon configuration on the GPU AMI (#351). * Note that if you have a workaround in place for this issue, you'll likely need to revert it.

    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.20-v20220523
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.19-v20220523
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.22-v20220523
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.21-v20220523

    • amazon-eks-node-1.22-v20220523
    • amazon-eks-node-1.21-v20220523
    • amazon-eks-node-1.20-v20220523
    • amazon-eks-node-1.19-v20220523

    Binaries used to build these AMIs are published: * s3://amazon-eks/1.22.6/2022-03-09/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.21.12/2022-05-20/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.20.11/2021-11-10/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.19.15/2021-11-10/

    AMI details: * kernel: 5.4.190-107.353.amzn2 * dockerd: 20.10.13-2.amzn2 * containerd: 1.4.13-2.amzn2.0.1 * runc: 1.0.3-2.amzn2 * cuda: 470.57.02-1 * nvidia-container-runtime-hook: 1.4.0-1.amzn2 * SSM agent: 3.1.1188.0

    Notable changes: * Added i4i instance support * Fixes regression in the docker group ID. AMI build will now fail if the docker group ID is not 1950. * Removes unused kernels (such as 4.14) during AMI build. This prevents false-positives from automated scanning tools such as AWS Inspector. * Maintain dockershim compatibility symlink after instance reboot * Updates 1.21 kubelet version to 1.21.12

    • amazon-eks-node-1.18-v20220112

    Binaries used to build these AMIs are published: * s3://amazon-eks/1.21.5/2021-11-10/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.20.11/2021-11-10/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.19.15/2021-11-10/ * s3://amazon-eks/1.18.20/2021-09-02/

    AMI details: * kernel: 5.4.162-86.275.amzn2 (1.19 and above), 4.14.256-197.484.amzn2 (1.18 and below) * dockerd: 20.10.7-5.amzn2 * containerd: 1.4.6-7.amzn2 * runc: 1.0.0-2.amzn2 * cuda: 470.57.02 * nvidia-container-runtime-hook: 1.4.0-1.amzn2 * SSM agent: 3.0.1124.0-1.amzn2

    Notable changes: * Updating aws-cli ( aws-cli/1.22.32 ). Latest CLI is installed using the recommended steps here. This change is specific to this AMI release. * Added fix to handle failures when serviceIpv6Cidr isn't provided. Related issue: https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/issues/839. * Added fix to make ipFamily check case-insensitive

    • amazon-eks-node-1.19-v20210722
    • amazon-eks-node-1.18-v20210722
    • amazon-eks-node-1.17-v20210722
    • amazon-eks-node-1.16-v20210722
    • amazon-eks-node-1.15-v20210722

    Notable changes: * This release includes the security patch for the kernel, for CVE-2021-33909.

    AMI Release v20210720

    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.21-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.20-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.19-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.18-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.17-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.16-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.15-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.21-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.20-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.19-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.18-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.17-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.16-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.15-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-node-1.21-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-node-1.20-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-node-1.19-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-node-1.18-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-node-1.17-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-node-1.16-v20210720
    • amazon-eks-node-1.15-v20210720

    EKS AMI release for Kubernetes version 1.21 (1.21 AMIs for GPU and ARM in us-gov-west-1 and us-gov-east-1 are included in this release) * Note: The containerd has patch for CVE-2-21-32760

    Containerd runtime support The EKS Optimized Amazon Linux 2 AMI now contains a bootstrap (https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/blob/master/files/bootstrap.sh) flag --container-runtime to optionally enable the containerd runtime. This flag is available in all supported Kubernetes versions of the AMI. This change is to get ahead of the removal of Docker as a supported runtime in Kubernetes (more details here (https://kubernetes.io/blog/2020/12/02/dockershim-faq/)). Feedback is appreciated.

    FIPS Kernel Panic issue on 5.4.X is fixed - https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/issues/632

    AMI Release v20210716

    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.21-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.20-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.19-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.18-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.17-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.16-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.15-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.21-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.20-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.19-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.18-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.17-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.16-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.15-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-node-1.21-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-node-1.20-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-node-1.19-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-node-1.18-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-node-1.17-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-node-1.16-v20210716
    • amazon-eks-node-1.15-v20210716

    EKS AMI release for Kubernetes version 1.21 (1.21 AMIs for GPU and ARM in us-gov-west-1 and us-gov-east-1 aren't a part of this release) * Note: The containerd has patch for CVE-2-21-32760

    Containerd runtime support The EKS Optimized Amazon Linux 2 AMI now contains a bootstrap (https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/blob/master/files/bootstrap.sh) flag --container-runtime to optionally enable the containerd runtime. This flag is available in all supported Kubernetes versions of the AMI. This change is to get ahead of the removal of Docker as a supported runtime in Kubernetes (more details here (https://kubernetes.io/blog/2020/12/02/dockershim-faq/)). Feedback is appreciated.

    FIPS Kernel Panic issue on 5.4.X is fixed - https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/issues/632

    AMI details: * kernel: 5.4.117-58.216.amzn2 (1.19 and above), 4.14.232-177.418.amzn2 (1.18 and below) * dockerd: 19.03.13ce * containerd: 1.4.1 * runc: 1.0.0-rc93 * cuda: 460.73.01 * nvidia-container-runtime-hook: 460.73.01 * SSM agent: 3.0.1295.0

    Notable changes:

    Includes the latest security patches for systemd, python3 and others.

    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.19-v20210501

    Notable changes:

    • Patches for Linux kernel 4.14, used by AMIs with Kubernetes v1.18 and below (CVE ALAS2-2021-1627)
    • Patches for Linux kernel 5.4, used by AMIs with Kubernetes v1.19 to fix a race condition with Conntrack.

    AMI Release v20210414

    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.19-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.18-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.17-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.16-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.15-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.19-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.18-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.17-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.16-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.15-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-node-1.19-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-node-1.18-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-node-1.17-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-node-1.16-v20210414
    • amazon-eks-node-1.15-v20210414

    Binaries used to build these AMIs are published: s3://amazon-eks/1.19.6/2021-01-05/ s3://amazon-eks/1.18.9/2020-11-02/ s3://amazon-eks/1.17.12/2020-11-02/ s3://amazon-eks/1.16.15/2020-11-02/ s3://amazon-eks/1.15.12/2020-11-02/

    Notable changes: A regression was introduced for 1.19 AMI in the last release as a result of runc version update to 1.0.0-rc93 causing nodes to flap between Ready and NotReady, more details #648. We are reverting the runc version back to 1.0.0-rc92.

    AMI Release v20210329

    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.19-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.18-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.17-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.16-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.15-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.19-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.18-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.17-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.16-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-arm64-node-1.15-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-node-1.19-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-node-1.18-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-node-1.17-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-node-1.16-v20210329
    • amazon-eks-node-1.15-v20210329

    Binaries used to build these AMIs are published: s3://amazon-eks/1.19.6/2021-01-05/ s3://amazon-eks/1.18.9/2020-11-02/ s3://amazon-eks/1.17.12/2020-11-02/ s3://amazon-eks/1.16.15/2020-11-02/ s3://amazon-eks/1.15.12/2020-11-02/

    Notable changes: A regression was introduced to the 4.14 Amazon Linux Kernel where I/O could slow significantly after running some workloads for a long period of time (observations point to between 4 hours and several days). This release contains the Kernel patch which fixes the above issue.

    • amazon-eks-node-1.15-v20210309

    Binaries used to build these AMIs are published : s3://amazon-eks/1.19.6/2021-01-05/ s3://amazon-eks/1.18.9/2020-11-02/ s3://amazon-eks/1.17.12/2020-11-02/ s3://amazon-eks/1.16.15/2020-11-02/ s3://amazon-eks/1.15.12/2020-11-02/

    Notable changes : - Updates Nvidia drivers to version 460.27.04 - GPU AMIs no longer uses daemon.json defined in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/blob/master/files/docker-daemon.json

    AMI Release v20210302

    GPU AMIs in this release are not compatible with any eksctl version after eksctl 0.34.0

    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.19-v20210302
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.18-v20210302
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.17-v20210302
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.16-v20210302
    • amazon-eks-gpu-node-1.15-v20210302

    • amazon-eks-node-1.18-v20210302
    • amazon-eks-node-1.17-v20210302
    • amazon-eks-node-1.16-v20210302
    • amazon-eks-node-1.15-v20210302

    Binaries used to build these AMIs are published: - s3://amazon-eks/1.19.6/2021-01-05/ - s3://amazon-eks/1.18.9/2020-11-02/ - s3://amazon-eks/1.17.12/2020-11-02/ - s3://amazon-eks/1.16.15/2020-11-02/ - s3://amazon-eks/1.15.12/2020-11-02/

    Notable changes: - files/bootstrap.sh: ensure /etc/docker exists before writing to it (#611) - GPU AMIs now use docker daemon.json defined in https://github.com/awslabs/amazon-eks-ami/blob/master/files/docker-daemon.json - Patch for CVE-2021-3177 - check that nvidia-smi is configured correctly before updating GPU clocks (#613) - Fix Makefile indentation for 1.19 (#616) - Increase fs.inotify.max_user_instances to 8192 from the default of 128 (#614) - use dynamic lookup of docker gid (#622) - bump docker version to 19.03.13ce-1 (#624)

    • 2823ba8 remove superflous quotes
    • 310215e Property --cgroup-root was not specified
    • 7d5a94b Set hairpin mode to "hairpin-veth"
    • 5479e95 disable docker0 bridge as it is not used
    • 491a913 add bip address from RFC5735 / RFC5737 This will reduce the number of possible conflicts to deploy on existing networks. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5735 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5737
